title: S17 Ep87: Hunting Werewolves & the Weirdness of the Wold Newton Triangle w/ Charles Christian
itunes:title: Hunting Werewolves & the Weirdness of the Wold Newton Triangle w/ Charles Christian
description:
Darkness Radio presents Hunting Werewolves & the Weirdness of the Wold Newton Triangle with Author/Investigator Charles Christian!

In today's episode, we travel over to England and sit down with Author/Investigator Charles Christian to talk about not only his personal paranormal experiences, but folklore of Dark Age England, the time he went on the hunt for a werewolf and a vampire, The legends of werewolves, the myth and reality behind dragons and the stories surrounding the Wold Newton Triangle!

Check out all the books that Charles Christian has to offer here, including his latest one "The Mysterious Wold Newton Triangle" here:  https://www.urbanfantasist.com/
